Reviews.Title: “a lovely calming oasis”
Reviews.Author: Josie0007
Reviews.Content: location 5 minutes walk roma san pietro train station tofrom roma termini nearest metro stop ottaviano station st peters 15 min walk 64 bus runs roma san pietro roma termini incredibly crowded wouldnt recommend trying squeeze luggage plus traffic awful dont fast found walking sights easy walk town tiber trastavere dinner emilia met arrival lovely helpful welcoming guesthouse 2 1 ensuite 1 bathroom door wee kitchen separating emilia family live door happen help definitely suggestions local eat fantastic value meals theres wee pizza type corner train station cheapest pizza weve plus beers juices dinner drinks €10 beautifully decorated cared comfortable bed dresser couch modern functional bathroom theres air con tv free wifi breakfast included prepackaged croissants cake spreads kitchen equipped preferred cook stock breakfast items found start day little repetitive 4th morning serviced daily downsides walls thin woken night sometimes 23am people coming home sometimes staying drinking front door lock struggle noisy shower awful trickle struggled wash hair hot water constantly disappeared wed water offon numerous times thats building water issue particular contrary reviewer found able pay credit card overall enjoyed stay definitely recommend stay return rome

Reviews.Title: “Just perfect !!!”

Reviews.Content: nice stay la cupola guest house clean quiet offered standard reasonable price guest house bathroom selfservice kitchen common emilia owner lives door helped smile grazie location guest house fantastic vatican takes 5 min walk piazza basilica san pietro visiting city centre piazza navona campo de fiori pantheon etc don´t feel walking city centre bus 64 eg piazza venezia begin sightseeing visiting forum romanum colosseo fontana di trevi looking forward coming czech republic
